Begin in Athens with a tour through the Acropolis and the New Acropolis Museum, where, at last, the statues of Classic Greece have found their home. Continue on from Athens along the coastal road and stop in for a visit of the Theatre of Epidaurus, famous for its remarkable acoustics. Visit the Museum of Delphi, the most famous oracle of the ancient world. Marvel at the site of Meteora, perched on top of huge rocks, and admire its ageless Monasteries. Standard Room (6 Nights) Travel Dates: 16 Apr - 30 Apr 26 & 2 May - 31 Oct 26 Twin per person fr $2,378 Note: ^Price excludes a Climate crisis resilience tax and is payable direct to hotel.
